This file documents the datasets contained in this package.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(joeyr)
data("joey_coronals")
joey_coronals
```

Midpoints of all vowels

```{r}
midpoints <- joey_coronals %>%
  filter(percent == 50, 
         vowel %ni% c("PRICE", "MOUTH", "CHOICE")) %>%
  select(-percent) %>%
  print()
midpoints %>%
  pull(word) %>%
  unique() %>%
  length()

usethis::use_data(midpoints, overwrite = TRUE)
```


```{r}
mouth <- joey_coronals %>%
  filter(vowel == "MOUTH") %>%
  select(-vowel) %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = F1:F4, names_to = "formant", values_to = "hz") %>%
  filter(formant %in% c("F1", "F2")) %>%
  unite(traj_id, vowel_id, formant, remove = FALSE) %>%
  arrange(traj_id)
mouth %>%
  pull(vowel_id) %>%
  unique() %>%
  length()

usethis::use_data(mouth, overwrite = TRUE)
```
